examples: It was in some newspaper.
Did you see today's newspaper?
He likes reading the newspaper.
Murdoch owns many newspapers
Hand me the newspaper, please.
He works for a local newspaper.
The newspaper lay on the table.
Have you read today's newspaper?
He sued the newspaper for libel.
He read his newspaper at breakfast.
He used some newspaper to get the fire started.
a past editor of the newspaper
I always buy a daily newspaper.
Frank tossed her the newspaper.
the inside pages of the newspaper
The newspaper is published daily.
The newspaper carries the article.
I saw your advert in the newspaper.
She reminded me to buy a newspaper.
These reptiles publish a newspaper.
She quoted from a newspaper article.
Have you finished with the newspaper?
I read her obituary in the newspaper.
He had the newspaper right in his hand.
He perused the newspaper over breakfast.
She had read about it in the newspapers.
That dog has torn up my newspaper again.
I will paragraph you in every newspaper.
The newspaper was spread across his lap.
The story in the newspaper is incorrect.
example_translate: Он подал в суд на газету за клевету.
Он использовал газету, чтобы развести огонь.
Я видел ваше объявление в газете.
Она напомнила мне, чтобы я купил газету.
Я читал ее некролог в газете.
Он держал эту газету прямо в руках.
За завтраком он внимательно просмотрел газету.
Она уже прочла об этом в газетах.
Я напишу о вас во всех газетах.
Газета была разостлана у него на коленях.
